bwwExcerpt: To be clear, the clunking weirdness of this jukebox musical devoted to the "queen of disco" has nothing to do with the three singers representing Summer at different stages of her life. Storm Lever as young "Duckling Donna," Ariana DeBose as "Disco Donna," and-most stage-commandingly -LaChanze as "Diva Donna" do all they can to animate and give variously fierce or smooth fuel to the show's retinue of Summer's standards; the same goes for the hard-working, hard-dancing ensemble.
